title: Investigation at Cuban Hebrew Congregation
description: A black and white photo depicts a police officer standing outdoors near a police car with the door open. The scene is viewed through a bullet hole in stained glass, as noted in the accompanying image text. The text mentions 'Cuban Hebrew Congregation' and the name of the officer, MBPD Sgt Steve Robbins. The back of the photo includes stamps and marks from the Miami Herald.
